Sentencas: Technique was developed for fabrication of a supporting thin-walled gas-tight ZrO2-Y2O3 electrolyte base of strict configuration for tubular solid-oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Formation and Properties of a Support Made of Solid Solutions Based on Zirconium Oxide for Single Tubular Solid-Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The technique includes a plasma-assisted deposition and vacuum impregnation with salt solutions, followed by a thermal treatment.
Titulo: Formation and Properties of a Support Made of Solid Solutions Based on Zirconium Oxide for Single Tubular Solid-Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The properties of plasma-ceramic solid electrolytes based on cubic and tetragonal (t') forms of ZrO2 and the same electrolytes modified with small additions (0.5 wt %) of aluminum oxide were examined.
Titulo: Formation and Properties of a Support Made of Solid Solutions Based on Zirconium Oxide for Single Tubular Solid-Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The phase composition, electrical conductivity, thermal expansion, and stability of the materials synthesized were studied.
Titulo: Formation and Properties of a Support Made of Solid Solutions Based on Zirconium Oxide for Single Tubular Solid-Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: A high stability in time of the tetragonal t'-solid electrolytes was noted, which opens up prospects for their application in solid-oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Formation and Properties of a Support Made of Solid Solutions Based on Zirconium Oxide for Single Tubular Solid-Oxide Fuel Cells
